long_description: Our Novara Thermal Tech leg warmers add warmth when you need it. They're easy to stash and a lifesaver on rides that start out chilly but end up warm! With 4-way stretch and a supersoft fleecy interior, fabric offers great stretch and insulating properties. Leg warmers are fitted to move effortlessly with your body without binding or twisting, so you enjoy maximum comfort and freedom of motion. Exposed soft elastic grippers at the top openings keep warmers comfortably in place without slippage. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Back ankle zippers allow easy on/off over bike shoes; zipper tabs lock so they won't flap as you move. Novara Thermal Tech leg warmers feature reflective accents for added visibility in low light.
